body: Help! I'm doing the giveaway thing and Fraps isn't recording it! Help me! :O
body_tagged: Help! I'm doing the giveaway thing and Fraps isn't recording it! Help me! :O
title: Help!

replies.body: What do you mean dude? Did you check your toggle keys, it might be messed up from F9? Maybe launch it through administrator thingy meh bob? Also, restart your computer, always works really! Then use Ccleaner to clean stuff mate!
replies.body_tagged: What do you mean dude? Did you check your toggle keys, it might be messed up from F9? Maybe launch it through administrator thingy meh bob? Also, restart your computer, always works really! Then use Ccleaner to clean stuff mate!

replies.body: Like it just doesnt record! I click F9 and nothing happens.
replies.body_tagged: Like it just doesnt record! I click F9 and nothing happens.

replies.body: Check your toggle keys then, it is probably changed around or run it thru admin permissions!
replies.body_tagged: Check your toggle keys then, it is probably changed around or run it thru admin permissions!

replies.body: How big is Bandicam? Like Whats the MB?
replies.body_tagged: How big is Bandicam? Like Whats the MB?

replies.body: Are you trying to record the winner by using a randomizer because fraps does not work on web browsers.
replies.body_tagged: Are you trying to record the winner by using a randomizer because fraps does not work on web browsers.

reply_to.body: Like it just doesnt record! I click F9 and nothing happens.
reply_to.body_tagged: Like it just doesnt record! I click F9 and nothing happens.

replies.body: Yeah, that is true! Maybe use this for a screen recording, it is simple and easy as http://www.screencast-o-matic.com/ That! Don't use it for game recording, only for screen recording!
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, that is true! Maybe use this for a screen recording, it is simple and easy as http://www.screencast-o-matic.com/ That! Don't use it for game recording, only for screen recording!

replies.body: Thanks guys! Uploading now! :D More giveaways in the future! :P
